content: this easy-level crochet blanket features timeless stripes for a versatile addition to your décor made fuss-free thanks to caron jumbo ombre simply focus on the stitchwork as the colors take care of themselves practice single_crochet double_crochet and treble_crochet front post for a touchable all-over texture that s cozy and inviting finished with a fun fringe this layer is perfect for the home or cottage materials caron® jumbo ombre™ 12 oz/340 g 595 yds/544 m lake mist 19013 4 balls or 2319 yds/2120 m measurements approx 48½ x 56 123 x 142 cm excluding fringe
